issue.title: [Release] Update changelog.py to use APACHE_ prefixed JIRA_USERNAME and JIRA_PASSWORD environment variables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6741](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6741). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Merge script has recently changed to use APACHE_JIRA_USERNAME and APACHE_JIRA_PASSWORD, changelog.py should use the same environment variables.

Also we could use crossbow.py changelog command which implements
the same functionality.
